import React, { useState } from 'react' function ViewTodo({ todo, setTodo }) { const [isEditted, setIsEddited] = useState(null); const [editData, setEditData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', date: '', status: '' }); const handleDelete = (index) => { const delteTask = todo.filter((item, i) => index !== i); setTodo(delteTask) } const handleEdit = (index) => { setIsEddited(index); setEditData(todo[index]); } const handleSave = (index) => { const updateData = [...todo]; updateData[index] = editData; setTodo(updateData) setIsEddited(null); } const handleCancel = () => { setIsEddited(null); } console.log(todo) return (
{todo.map((item, index) => (
{isEditted === index ? (

Add Todo

setEditData({ ...editData, name: e.target.value })} id='name' />
setEditData({ ...editData, email: e.target.value })} id='email' />
setEditData({ ...editData, date: e.target.value })} id='date' />
) : (

{item.name}

{item.email}

{item.date}

{item.status}

)}
))}
) } export default ViewTodo
